overview: A kidnapper who riffles the asses of the bastard and a pimp who raises the counters and pays in kind, enter the universe Mafioso where the guys do not laugh. Here you pay cash with your mouth and your ass, you pumps to save your skin and you give your ball to pay your debts but in any case you will be sequestered, badly led and burglarize the holes. Bang! Bang!
title: Mafioso
